name: Ruby's Journey
description:
The story of a girl that risks her life to escape from a world ruled by technology.

---------------------------------DO NOT ENABLE FULL SCREEN--------------------------------

Controls:

MOVE with the LEFT and RIGHT keys

JUMP with the X key

DASH by holding the Z key

ROLL to destroy enemies by holding the DOWN key

PAUSE - P key

RESTART STAGE - R key
